about.title: Cozy Bear Café
about.paragraph:
Cozy Bear Café is a maid café that combines the charm of traditional maid service with a fantasy twist. The maids wear classic, frilly uniforms adorned with lace and bows, but also have real animal features like bunny ears and cat tails, each matching their unique personalities.

The café’s cozy, elegant setting features plush seating, ornate tables, and soft lighting, creating a magical yet welcoming atmosphere. Delicate lace curtains and whimsical animal-themed decorations enhance the fantasy vibe, while soft music adds to the enchanting experience.

dialogues.subtitle: Cozy Bear Café
dialogues.dialogue: As you step through the doors, the aroma of freshly brewed coffee and pastries fills the air. A maid with long, silver hair and calm gray eyes approaches.

“Welcome to Whiskers & Lace. I’m Annalise, your bunny-maid today. How may I serve you?” <bold>She curtsies gracefully, her bunny ears twitching. Before you can respond, another maid bounces over with a lively step, her pink fox ears perking up as she grins.

“Oh, a new face! I’m Stephanie, your cunning fox-maid. Prepare to be dazzled by our charms.” <bold>She winks, her fox tail swishing playfully. A timid boy with tousled blonde hair peeks out from behind her, his soft brown eyes wide and nervous.
“Um, h-hi… I’m Micah, your bear-maid for today…” <bold>His voice is barely a whisper, and he clutches his apron nervously. Annalise gives him a reassuring nod and gestures to a nearby table.
“Please, take a seat.”
<bold>She sets down porcelain utensils with delicate precision, then turns to the other maids.
“Stephanie, Micah, let’s give our guest a proper welcome.”
“Of course, but a little flair never hurt anyone, right, Micah?” <bold>She nudges him, her eyes sparkling with mischief, and he blushes deeply.
“Um, I-I suppose…”
<bold>Annalise smiles gently, her expression encouraging.
“You’re doing wonderfully, Micah.”
<bold>She turns back to you, her gaze soft and attentive.
“What can we offer you today? A soothing tea, freshly baked pastries, or perhaps something heartier?” <bold>Stephanie leans closer, her fox ears twitching with excitement.
“I recommend our enchanted tea blend—it’s to die for! And it might even grant you a wish…”
<bold>Micah, gaining a bit of confidence, adds softly.
“The honey cakes are really good too. Sweet and comforting, just like a warm hug…”
<bold>Stephanie chuckles and drapes an arm around Micah’s shoulders.
“Micah, you’re sweet enough to give our honey cakes some serious competition, don’t you think, Annalise?”
<bold>Annalise nods, her smile warm.
“Absolutely. Micah makes everyone feel welcome.”
<bold>She turns to you, her expression sincere.
“Yes, do tell us your heart’s desires… We’re here to make your day magical.”
“Y-yes, please feel free to ask us anything… We’re here to make your day special.”
<bold>What will you do?
